term.title: cyclitols

item.text: Hydroxylated cycloalkanes containing at least three hydroxy groups, each attached to a different ring carbon atom.

sources.item: PAC, 1995, 67, 1307. 'Glossary of class names of organic compounds and reactivity intermediates based on structure (IUPAC Recommendations 1995)' on page 1330 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199567081307)
